description:
Naruto releases his Nine-Tail chakra and sends Sasuke flying. Sasuke counters with his Fire Style Jutsu, but Naruto extinguishes the flames easily.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cri des larmes, tu es mon ami
Namida no Houkou! Omae wa Ore no Tomodachi Da
Tearful Yell! You Are My Friend.
Was tut man nicht alles für einen Freund …
เสียงคำรามแห่งน้ำตา
涙の咆哮! オマエはオレの友達だ
